Articles.Content:
While waiting for RSS V102 to come on board... a V090 IVA 'launch to Orbit' movie.

Doing the IVA in the ***Sardine*** tin can ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif).. Funny thing is that I achieved a better profile, in the can, than external ?

Movie (can be boring for the ADD types) is running at 4x times speed (keeping it short ?), with 2x 'external' SAS node locks (cannot do this inside the fish can yet).

The engine sounds didn't appear in this launch .. which is a pity ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/7sa0kwo7kfnot6d/IVA%20Launch.mp4?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/7sa0kwo7kfnot6d/IVA%20Launch.mp4?dl=0) (66MB = 5:30)
